text: alam tara anna l-laha yaʿlamu ma fi l-samawati wama fi l-ardi ma yakunu min najwa thalathatin illa huwa rabiʿuhum wala khamsatin illa huwa sadisuhum wala adna min dhalika wala akthara illa huwa maʿahum ayna ma kanu thumma yunabbi-uhum bima ʿamilu yawma l-qiyamati inna l-laha bikulli shayin ʿalimun
